movies.Title: Dum
movies.Actors: Vivek Oberoi, Dia Mirza, Atul Kulkarni
movies.Plot: When one of his colleagues becomes corrupted by power and goes over to the dark side, a young police officer tries to bring the offender to justice.

movies.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.Writer: James Gunn, Dan Abnett, Andy Lanning
movies.Actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista
movies.Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 15 wins & 58 nominations total

movies.Title: Kong: Skull Island
movies.Writer: Dan Gilroy, Max Borenstein, Derek Connolly
movies.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson, Brie Larson
movies.Plot: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 1 win & 20 nominations total

movies.Title: Alien: Covenant
movies.Writer: Dan O'Bannon, Ronald Shusett, Jack Paglen
movies.Actors: Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup
movies.Plot: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

movies.Title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
movies.Actors: Milla Jovovich, Iain Glen, Ali Larter
movies.Plot: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

movies.Title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
movies.Actors: Demi Lovato, Rainn Wilson, Joe Manganiello
movies.Plot: In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf h

movies.Title: Dhoom
movies.Actors: Abhishek Bachchan, John Abraham, Uday Chopra
movies.Plot: A mysterious gang of bikers is on a robbing spree. ACP Jai gets Ali, a mechanic, to assist him in the case. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to nab the thieves red-handed.

movies.Title: Man Bites Dog
movies.Director: Rémy Belvaux, André Bonzel, Benoît Poelvoorde
movies.Writer: Rémy Belvaux, André Bonzel, Benoît Poelvoorde
movies.Actors: Benoît Poelvoorde, Jacqueline Poelvoorde-Pappaert, Nelly Pappaert
movies.Plot: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

movies.Title: The Godfather
movies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
movies.Plot: The Godfather follows Vito Corleone, Don of the Corleone family, as he passes the mantle to his unwilling son, Michael.
